text:
Gemini is really breathing down ChatGPT's neck now 

• Closing gap on monthly downloads (100.8M vs. 67.8M in November)

• Users now spend more time in Gemini than ChatGPT

Chatgpt 5.2 vs Gemini 3 Live Test

​The battle is finally over.
​Everyone is asking which one is actually better.
​The answer depends entirely on the workflow.
​Here is the breakdown thread to stop wasting time on the wrong tool.

GROK 4.1 VS GEMINI 3 VS CHATGPT 5.1: HOW GROK LEADS THE WAY

The top players in AI have made their latest moves. 

OpenAI’s GPT-5.1 prioritizes seamless instruction-following and polished tone control.

Google’s Gemini 3 dominates in multimodal performance, blending text,

ChatGPT (left)  vs.  Gemini 3.0  vs.  Grok 4.1 (right)

Gemini finished in 30 seconds. Took 2 minutes for ChatGPT and Grok.

This will piss off the ChatGPT fanboys.

So, my friend just tested ChatGPT, DeepSeek, and Gemini on the same UI design challenge.

The winner isn't what the benchmarks told you.

Here's the real comparison no one's talking about:

ChatGPT (left)  vs.  Gemini 3.0  vs.  Grok 4.1 (right)  

Gemini finished in 40 seconds. ChatGPT failed. Took 2 minutes for Grok.

ChatGPT o3 vs Gemini 2.5 Pro

Same prompts. Wildly different results.

I’ve included videos to prove it:

THREAD ↓

The app functions as an AI chatbot or assistant, rivalling ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini, among others. 

• Model efficiency: Smaller size, similar performance
• API costs: $8 per million tokens vs GPT-4's $30
• Processing speed: 1000 words/sec VS ChatGPT's 650

(3/3)

I ran the same prompts on ChatGPT 5.2 and Gemini 3.

The results shocked me.

ChatGPT felt like a senior engineer.
Precise. Logical. No fluff.

Gemini felt like a smart assistant.
Flexible. Practical. Plugged into real life.

Same task.
Very different brains.

Save this video,

How is no one talking about this?

Gemini is reviewing 450+ sources for me when creating deep research reports. 

ChatGPT might be 10-15. 

The quality and depth is night and day IMO.

Who is "winning" the consumer in AI? 

ChatGPT started 2025 as the runaway leader, and is still at 3x Gemini's size 

But Gemini is now growing 155% YoY vs. ChatGPT's 23%

....and their growth rate is accelerating at scale
